title: Replace green color theme with royal blue across the entire website

requirements.summary: Replace all green color values with royal blue (#1a4fa0) and its tonal variants across the entire website including CSS custom properties, Tailwind config, and all component files
acceptanceCriteria: No green color values (#1a7a3c, #166534, or similar) remain in any component, CSS, or Tailwind config file
Navigation bar uses royal blue background (#1a4fa0 or close variant)
Hero section background/gradient uses royal blue
All buttons use royal blue with appropriate hover states in a lighter or darker blue
Testimonials section dark background is replaced with deep navy blue instead of dark green
Footer background is replaced with deep navy blue instead of dark green
Section accent underlines, card icon colors, and hover highlights all use blue variants
Tailwind config brand color tokens are updated to blue values
CSS custom properties in index.css are updated to blue values
The website remains fully mobile-responsive after the color change
White text on blue backgrounds remains legible throughout

file_operations.description: Replace all green OKLCH color values in CSS custom properties with royal blue equivalents. Update --brand-primary from green (0.45 0.15 155) to royal blue (#1a4fa0 equivalent), --brand-primary-dark from dark green to deep navy (#0f2d6b equivalent), --brand-primary-light from light green to lighter blue (#2563eb equivalent), and any other green-based custom properties. Ensure all OKLCH values maintain proper contrast ratios for accessibility with white text.

Replace all green brand color tokens in the theme.extend.colors section with royal blue variants. Update brand.primary to #1a4fa0, brand.primary-dark to #0f2d6b, brand.primary-light to #2563eb, and any hover/accent colors from green to blue. Ensure the color palette maintains visual consistency across all breakpoints.

Replace all green color references with royal blue variants. Update the navigation bar background from bg-brand-primary/green to royal blue (#1a4fa0), change any green border, text, or accent colors to blue variants, update hover states on links and buttons to use lighter blue (#2563eb), and ensure the logo accent colors use blue instead of green. Maintain all existing responsive behavior and smooth-scroll functionality.

Replace the hero section background gradient overlay from green to royal blue. Update any bg-gradient or overlay classes using green to use royal blue (#1a4fa0) with appropriate opacity, change CTA button backgrounds and borders from green to royal blue with lighter blue (#2563eb) hover states, update any text accent colors or underlines from green to blue, and ensure the gradient remains visually appealing over the hero banner background image.

Replace any green color values with royal blue variants. Update the floating badge background from green to royal blue (#1a4fa0), change any green accent underlines or decorators on headings to blue, update border colors from green to blue, and ensure hover states use lighter blue (#2563eb) if applicable.

Replace all green icon accents, card hover highlights, and underlines with royal blue variants. Update icon colors from green to royal blue (#1a4fa0), change card hover border or background highlights from green to blue, update the accent underlines on headings from green to blue, and ensure hover animations use lighter blue (#2563eb) for smooth transitions.

Replace the dark green section background with deep navy blue. Update the section background from dark green (bg-brand-primary-dark or similar) to deep navy (#0f2d6b), change any green accent colors on cards or decorators to royal blue (#1a4fa0), update star rating colors if they use green to use a gold/yellow color for ratings (not blue), and ensure white text remains legible on the new dark navy background.

Replace any green border, hover, or accent colors with royal blue variants. Update image card borders or overlays from green to royal blue (#1a4fa0), change hover state colors to lighter blue (#2563eb), update lightbox navigation or zoom button colors from green to blue, and ensure the gallery maintains its responsive grid layout.

Replace all green color values with royal blue variants. Update the 'Open Now' status badge background from green to a suitable indicator color (keep green for status, but if used as brand accent, change to blue), change info card icon colors from green to royal blue (#1a4fa0), update the 'Get Directions' CTA button from green to royal blue with lighter blue hover state, and update any border or accent colors from green to blue.

Replace the dark green footer background with deep navy blue. Update the footer background from dark green to deep navy (#0f2d6b), change any green accent colors on links, borders, or decorators to royal blue (#1a4fa0), update hover states on links to use lighter blue (#2563eb), change the 'Visit Us' CTA button from green to royal blue with appropriate hover state, and ensure white text remains legible on the new dark navy background.
